meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be repeated or reproduced.
meanings.sent1: The repeatability of the experiment allowed us to confirm the results.
meanings.sent2: The machine's repeatability ensures that each product is identical.
meanings.sent3: The repeatability of the magic trick amazed the audience every time.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves had a repeatability that made them unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The repeatability of the song's chorus made it easy to sing along.

meanings.definition: The ability to achieve consistent results when a process is repeated.
meanings.sent1: The repeatability of the recipe guarantees a delicious cake every time.
meanings.sent2: In manufacturing, repeatability is crucial for maintaining quality standards.
meanings.sent3: The repeatability of his jokes always gets a laugh from the audience.
meanings.sent4: The team's repeatability in scoring goals secured their victory.
meanings.sent5: The repeatability of her painting technique made her a renowned artist.
